# QC Notification

@maintainer

## Metadata
current commit: abc123def456789012345678901234567890abcd
previous commit: def456789abc012345678901234567890123abcd

## File Difference

Reviewed the critical changes in src/main.rs. The implementation looks good but needs a few adjustments:

- Error handling could be improved
- Add unit tests for the new functionality
- Documentation needs updating

# QC Approve

## Note

Thanks @reviewer1 for the feedback! I've addressed all the points:

✅ Improved error handling with proper Result types
✅ Added comprehensive unit tests
✅ Updated documentation with examples

The changes are ready for final review.
